definition: finger/to point at or to/to indicate or refer to/to depend on/to count on/(of hair) to stand on end
to wave/to brandish/to command/to conduct/to scatter/to disperse
ministry/department/section/part/division/troops/board/classifier for works of literature, films, machines etc

sentences.english: The flood control headquarters has urged local governments to step up efforts to fight the floods.
sentences.chinese: 防洪抗旱总指挥部办公室号召当地政府全力抗洪。

sentences.english: The report cited data from the State Flood Control and Drought Relief Headquarters.
sentences.chinese: 报道来援引了国家防汛抗旱总指挥部的数据加以说明。

sentences.english: The pigs had set aside the harness-room as a headquarters for themselves.
sentences.chinese: 猪已经把农具室当作他们的总指挥部了。

definition: war zone/combat zone/(military) theater of operations
Military Commission of the Communist Party Central Committee/same as 軍委|军委
commander-in-chief/top military commander for a country or theater of operations
Military Commission of the Communist Party Central Committee
political commissar (during Russian and Chinese communist revolutions)
geographical area of command/(PLA) military district
